channel.title: Help please?

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @boxes boxes
item.description:
@boxes wrote:

how would I change this to wear a normal person could wear this item, without being a donator?

if(c.isDonator == 0)
for(int i : donItems)
if(wearID == i) {
c.sendMessage(“You must be a donator to wear this item.”);
return false;
}

Read full topic
